sentences.en: Christians confess the lordship and the providential care of God over the world.
sentences.cn: 基督徒承认世界各地的贵族身份和上帝的天佑的照顾.

sentences.en: He explained the yellow fever epidemic as a providential act to discourage urban growth.
sentences.cn: 他解释说黄热病的流行恰好减缓了城市的扩张。

sentences.en: It'struck her as providential that she should be the instrument of his initiation.
sentences.cn: 在她看来,由她来担任这个启蒙的角色实出天意.

sentences.en: Providential: This disposition of likelihood and individual is concerned.
sentences.cn: 天意: 这个可能和个人的性格有关.

sentences.en: Soames Forsyte was a member of the board of the Providential Premium Reassurance Society.
sentences.cn: 索姆斯·福赛特是天佑再保险会的董事.

sentences.en: The pistols were loaded so our escape is indeed providential.
sentences.cn: 手枪是上了子弹的，所以我们能逃脱实在幸运。

sentences.en: Their departure just before the floods providential.
sentences.cn: 他们恰在发洪水之前离开,走得真是时候.

sentences.en: Their departure just before the floods was providential.
sentences.cn: 他们恰在发洪水之前离开,走得真是时候.

sentences.en: This was providential rest and shelter until the moon rose.
sentences.cn: 在月亮出来之前这里可以做短暂的休息和庇护所.

trans.tran_en: a providential event is a lucky one
